name: xpindir
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wceq(cxp(cin(c0, c1), c2), cin(cxp(c0, c2), cxp(c1, c2)))

stmt.origin: eqtr2i(cxp(cin(c0, c1), c2), cin(cxp(c0, c2), cxp(c1, c2)), cxp(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cxp(cin(c0, c1), c2), cin(cxp(c0, c2), cxp(c1, c2)))
-| wceq(cin(cxp(c0, c2), cxp(c1, c2)), cxp(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c2)))
-| wceq(cxp(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c2)), cxp(cin(c0, c1), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cxp(cin(c0, c1), c2), cin(cxp(c0, c2), cxp(c1, c2)))
-| wceq(cin(cxp(c0, c2), cxp(c1, c2)), cxp(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c2)))
-| wceq(cxp(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c2)), cxp(cin(c0, c1), c2))

body.origin: |- wceq(cin(cxp(c0, c2), cxp(c1, c2)), cxp(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cxp(cin(c0, c1), c2), cin(cxp(c0, c2), cxp(c1, c2)))
-| wceq(cxp(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c2)), cxp(cin(c0, c1), c2))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cxp(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c2)), cxp(cin(c0, c1), c2))
-| wceq(cin(c2, c2), c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cxp(cin(c0, c1), c2), cin(cxp(c0, c2), cxp(c1, c2)))
-| wceq(cin(c2, c2), c2)
|- wceq(cxp(cin(c0, c1), c2), cin(cxp(c0, c2), cxp(c1, c2)))

comment: Distributive law for Cartesian product over intersection. Similar to Theorem 102 of [Suppes] p. 52. (Contributed by NM, 26-Sep-2004.)
